document.full_text: iran has arrested members of a rebel group in kurdistan province, the official irna news agency reported tuesday, after several attacks on security forces in the restive border province in recent days.
document.title: iran arrests militants in restive province
lines_and_colors: iran has arrested members of a rebel group in kurdistan province, the official irna news agency reported tuesday, after several attacks on security forces in the restive border province in recent days.
